item.title: New Mexico police investigating mass shooting in Las Cruces park
item.description: Police in New Mexico are investigating a mass shooting that occurred Friday night in Las Cruces, police said.

item.title: Acting Social Security chief now says he won't shut down agency after DOGE ruling
item.description: A federal judge blocked the agency from granting personnel affiliated with DOGE access to agency systems containing personally identifiable informatio...

item.title: Boxing heavyweight champ George Foreman dies at 76
item.description: Former heavyweight boxing champion George Foreman, known as much for his gregarious personality as his vicious right hook, died Friday. He was 76 year...

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump calls Tesla dealership vandals terrorists
item.description: Trump continued to deny a report that Elon Musk was going to receive a briefing on a top-secret military plan for a potential war with China.

item.title: Trump: Tesla vandals should face 20 years in jail, be sent to El Salvador
